creator: felix.roethenbacher@wyona.com
text:
The file cocoon.xconf is patched from the src dir instead of from the build dir.
Attached patch changes to build dir so that overwriting of patch process is
possible without altering the src dir.
Incomplete patch. It does not work for lenya-1.2.
